participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Cheerful and enthusiastic about music and experiences.
participant_1.background: Skateboarding is a hobby of mine. I love candy. I have a crush on my coworker. I go to college part-time.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Passionate about music and enjoys socializing with friends.
participant_2.background: I work in retail. I go to at least 10 concerts a year. I love music. Lady Gaga is my current favorite singer. Madonna is my all-time favorite.

content.text: What's your favorite type of music?
I love Lady Gaga, Madonna, and music from the 80s.
I love Lady Gaga too! I've seen her in concert twice.
Me too! I saw her on her Born This Way tour.
That was a great concert. I also love her songs Telephone and Bad Romance.
Those are both great songs! I also love her new song Stupid Love.
I haven't heard that one yet. I'll have to check it out.
You should! It's a really good song.
I'm sure it is. I love all of her songs.
Me too! She's such a talented artist.
Yeah, she is. I'm glad we have something in common.
Me too! It's always nice to meet someone who loves Lady Gaga as much as I do.
I agree. It's rare to find someone who appreciates her music as much as I do.
We should go to a concert together sometime.
That would be fun! I'll have to keep an eye out for when she's coming to town.
Great! We can set up a time to go when we find out.
